leaf: Tests to rule out endocrine causes
paths: Root node representing a patient with obesity -> Gather patient history including rate of weight gain, dietary history, caloric expenditure, prescribed diet for successful weight loss, recently quit smoking, endocrine features (cold, constipation, hair change, virilization, striae, buffalo hump) -> Tests to rule out endocrine causes

leaf: Counsel regarding diet/exercise to ideal BMI (23)
paths: Root node representing a patient with obesity -> Measure BMI and waist circumference -> Management of the patient -> Counsel regarding diet/exercise to ideal BMI (23)

leaf: Check lipids and glucose. Control blood pressure. Make a dietary plan and follow-up
paths: Root node representing a patient with obesity -> Measure BMI and waist circumference -> Management of the patient -> Check lipids and glucose. Control blood pressure. Make a dietary plan and follow-up

leaf: Check fasting lipids and glucose. Control blood pressure. Make a dietary plan and follow-up. If unsuccessful or if elevated glucose or lipids, consider supplemental medication
paths: Root node representing a patient with obesity -> Measure BMI and waist circumference -> Management of the patient -> Check fasting lipids and glucose. Control blood pressure. Make a dietary plan and follow-up. If unsuccessful or if elevated glucose or lipids, consider supplemental medication

leaf: See BMI 30-35. If osteoarthritis present, consider low-impact exercise alternatives
paths: Root node representing a patient with obesity -> Measure BMI and waist circumference -> Management of the patient -> See BMI 30-35. If osteoarthritis present, consider low-impact exercise alternatives

leaf: Try all modalities. If unsuccessful, consider bariatric surgery
paths: Root node representing a patient with obesity -> Measure BMI and waist circumference -> Management of the patient -> Try all modalities. If unsuccessful, consider bariatric surgery
